item.title: Skill Id's and Pk Stats
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

0-hp
1-att
2-str
3-def
4-range
5-pray
6-range

and it goes down the line, im not 100% sure but just test with it .

and in quest thing/ declare a method if you dont have already and just and find the interface id for your quest tab and add something like :

You have “+pkPoints+” pk points

just change that to your method for kills and deaths.
